name: TilbudsFinder.dk
description: Tilbudsfinder is a web application built with C# and .NET that aggregates and displays current grocery store discounts. It utilizes a robust API for seamless data integration and is deployed on a Linux VPS, ensuring reliable and scalable performance. The project is designed to provide users with a streamlined way to find and compare deals, making grocery shopping more cost-efficient and convenient.

name: FluxETL
description: FluxETL is a low code ETL pipeline builder
